common.signInToUnlock: Sign in to unlock all lists
common.loadingText: This may take 1 minute - The server needs to wake up, it needs a coffee too!

keyboardHelp.title: Japanese Input Setup
keyboardHelp.windowsStep1: Press Win + Space to switch input methods
keyboardHelp.windowsStep2: Or click the language icon in taskbar
keyboardHelp.tip1: Type in romaji, it converts to hiragana
keyboardHelp.tip2: Press Space to convert to kanji

inputRulesHelp.kanjiReadingsDesc: Both romaji and kana typing are accepted. Okurigana are required, but parentheses surrounding them can be ignored are both valid).
inputRulesHelp.kanjiMeaningsDesc: Accents, parentheses, and other special characters are ignored when checking answers.
inputRulesHelp.vocabularyJapaneseDesc: The exact Japanese text is expected with the correct kanji. Okurigana are required, but parentheses can be ignored for them or other precisions.
inputRulesHelp.vocabularyTranslationsDesc: Accents, spaces, parentheses (and their content), "/", "-", and other characters can be ignored. With multiple translations, separators can be ignored and input order doesn't matter.

tooltips.kanjiModeAll: Find the kun / on readings, and meanings

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to unlock all lists and sync your progress across devices.
auth.termsAgreement: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

subscription.description: Get unlimited access to all vocabulary and kanji lists:

features.lifetimeAccess: Lifetime access - pay once, use forever

support.warningMessage: Please contact for subscription-related issues (subscription not detected, payment problems, etc.).
support.whatToInclude: What to include in your email?
support.instruction1: Your account email (if different from the email you're contacting me from)
support.instruction3: A detailed description of your issue

mobileWarning.title: Desktop Recommended
mobileWarning.message: This app is designed for desktop or tablet use with a keyboard. The mobile experience is not optimized and may not work properly.

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.hostingInfo: This website is hosted by Vercel Inc., 440 N Barranca Ave #4133, Covina, CA 91723, USA.

terms.title: Terms of Use and Sale
terms.objectContent: These general terms govern the use of the Kana Cafe service, a web application for learning Japanese (kana, kanji, vocabulary).
terms.accessContent: Access to basic features (kana) is free. Full access to vocabulary and kanji lists requires a paid subscription or a lifetime purchase.
terms.accountContent: The user agrees to provide accurate information when creating their account and to maintain the confidentiality of their login credentials.
terms.pricingContent: The service offers two premium access options:
terms.paymentContent: Payments are securely processed by Stripe. No banking data is stored on our servers.
terms.withdrawalContent: In accordance with applicable consumer protection laws, the right of withdrawal cannot be exercised for digital content provided on an intangible medium whose execution has begun with the consumer's consent. By subscribing, you agree that the service will be accessible immediately.
terms.cancellationContent: The monthly subscription can be cancelled at any time from the Stripe customer portal. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period. Lifetime access is non-refundable.
terms.intellectualPropertyContent: All website content (texts, data, graphics, logos) is protected by copyright. Any unauthorized reproduction or use is prohibited.
terms.liabilityContent: The publisher strives to ensure service availability but cannot guarantee uninterrupted operation. The publisher shall not be held liable for indirect damages resulting from the use of the service.
terms.modificationsContent: The publisher reserves the right to modify these terms. Users will be notified of substantial changes.
terms.lawContent: These terms are governed by French law. In case of dispute, French courts shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy (GDPR)
privacy.dataCollectedIntro: We only collect data strictly necessary for the operation of the service:
privacy.authDataDetail: email address, first name, last name (provided during Google/Apple sign-in)
privacy.deviceDataDetail: information about connected devices (for session management)
privacy.purpose2: Provision and improvement of the service
privacy.legalBasisContent: Processing is based on contract performance (Article 6.1.b of GDPR) for service provision, and on legitimate interest (Article 6.1.f) for service improvement.
privacy.retentionContent: Your data is retained for the duration of your account, then deleted within 30 days after account deletion, unless legally required to retain it longer.
privacy.recipientsContent: Your data may be shared with:
privacy.cookiesContent: This website only uses technical cookies strictly necessary for the operation of the service (authentication, session). These cookies are exempt from consent requirements under the ePrivacy Directive.
privacy.rightsIntro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.rightErasure: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
privacy.rightsContact: To exercise these rights, contact us at
privacy.complaintContent: You may lodge a complaint with the CNIL (French Data Protection Authority): www.cnil.fr or with your local data protection authority.
